response.explain: The execution error indicates that the garlic clove has not been cooked yet. response.subtask:

(2) Take out the garlic clove
(3) Cook the garlic clove
(4) Put the cooked garlic clove on the countertop
(5) Take out the butter
(6) Put the cooked garlic clove and butter on the plate
